description: Obscure blackness is all to be seen as you helplessly are unable to make
your way around.  The touch of the eastern and northern walls can be felt
while passage is allowed from the west and the south also.  You trip over
something in the thick blackness..  Hmm.. your feet has just smushed
something..  What could it be?
8018.name: Darkness!

description: * THE ELEMENTS OF THE WATER IS NOT TO *
* BE TAKEN WITH CARELESSNESS FOR THEY *
* SHALL FEEL THE PAIN THAT RECEIVES!! *
A trail of blood flows from the western door to the eastern door here.
Strange unknown markings are written along the walls here as ice-torches hang
across the side walls.  Several icicle-crystals stick amongs the icy walls here
catching your eye as you make a glimpse of your surroundings.  Doors from
every direction allow you to move wherever.  An old SIGN hangs here.
8032.name: Eastern Cross Chamber

description: The struggle to make your way around here in pitch blackness has disabled
your safety in moving cautiously along this lonely passage.  The rattling of
chains and cries of wailing can be heard not too far eastward.
8019.name: Darkness!

description: Sudden flames rise high above you as you enter!  The intensity of the
heat makes it unbearable for you to see or do much in this dungeon.  Evil
cackling echoes from the walls adjacent this dungeon as you ponder to leave
out the door to the west.
8039.name: Dungeon of Flames

description: The level of water rises to your ankles as you enter.  Leaky drips of
water fall from the ceiling above as the darkness in the room makes it hard
to see around here.  A door out of here is to the east.
8037.name: Dungeon of Water

description: This small dark tunnel leads to a faint glow that can be seen to the
north.  The darkness here disables you from doing anything..  But rest.  You
wonder if its safe to rest in a place so dark as this?  A small door to the
south is possible while the north leaves you in curiousity..
8058.name: Tunnel

description: This is a small dark passage leading west and east here.  An iron door
with two brown torches hang beside it to the west.  From a distance you make
out a choice of directions to the east.
8009.name: Passage

description: The shadowy mists of the outside world can be seen in a dark blur.
The distant figure of an unknown entity is standing in a room not far from here.
Rocky walls layer the northern portion of the chamber while strange
glossy windows are seen on the western and southern walls.  The cracks
around these weak-layered bricks spill of water droplets dampening the
ground beneath your feet.  A door to the north gets you out of here.
Maybe you should look 'WEST' or 'SOUTH'
8066.name: Southern Cross Chamber

description: The strange dark blue room strikes you cautiously as strange wailings and
echos of cackling begin to carry around the room.  Strange mists of light
float about here as a low humming buzz distracts your presence.  The passage
to the south allows the only way out of here.
8057.name: Dark Blue Room

description: You are walking along a small dark passage leading west and east here.  A
huge door with two blue torches hang beside it to the west.  You make out a
choice of directions somewhat visible to the east.
8062.name: Passage

description: The magma-made stones separate itself in patterns to allow passage in all
four directions.  Several bats scurry above you here and there with no
notice.  It is deathly quiet all around you as cautiously you scan for any
signs of trouble.
8010.name: Room of the Northern Diamond

description: This is a dark small passage leading north and south here.  An icy door
with two strange blue torches hang beside it to the south.  A choice of
directions is visible to the north.
8065.name: Passage

description: Strangely, the ceiling above opens up here as the whole western wall is
layered with rocks.  A huge waterfull from above falls and creates a small
pond of sort that flows into a dark cave at the bottom of the western wall.
The color of the water is somewhat dark and eerie.  The capacity of the room
is somewhat limited for any physical combat to occur in here.  An exit goes
to the east.
8061.name: Western Cross Chamber

description: The grate above suddenly closes and locks by itself!  The light coming
from it is the only form of visibility to be seen.  Looking around, you find
that there are no walls but total blackness!  You grip your weapon much
tighter for the coming of the unknown!  No exits are visible as you find
yourself trapped!
8084.name: Final Encounter!

description: A shivering rumble is felt beneath you as you arrive outside two huge
doors that lead inside to the west and east.  A quiet dark passage leads
away to the south here.
8044.name: Outside the Dungeon Doors

description: The sudden grayness of the room fills your eyes with confusion or are
they deceiving you.  Not much can be seen but rotting walls and several
cobwebs hanging from the corners.  A low droning sound is heard as you
wonder what it could be.  A passage out of here is seen to the east.
8048.name: Gray Room

description: You are on a small dark passage leading west and east here.  An iron door
with two reddish-orange torches hang beside it to the west.  A choice of
directions can be seen to the east.  Several flames burn around you but none
to threaten or disable movement through here.
8069.name: Passage

description: A small dark passage leads west and east here.  An old door with two
strange blue torches hang beside it to the east.  From a distance, you make
out a choice of directions to the west.
8064.name: Passage

description: This small black tunnel leads to a glowing seen to the west.  The
darkness disables you from doing anything here.  An iron door is seen to the
east where a whistling breeze can be felt and heard.
8049.name: Tunnel

description: This is a small dark passage leading north and south here.  An iron door
with two strange brown torches hang beside it to the north.  From a distance,
you make out a choice of directions to the south.
8083.name: Passage

description: You've come upon a short dark tunnel with not much to be seen but total
blackness.  Several slops of slimey substances cover the old door to the
west.  The darkness moves itself eastward where a faint glow can be seen.
8013.name: Tunnel

description: The interesting display of decapitated heads hang around the walls of the
chamber.  The heads of the human, orc, gnoll, ogre, dwarf, hobgoblin, elf,
bugbear and bullybug hang on wall-sealed boards as an exhibit to those who
enter.  A table is seated at the western wall where several candles stand
beside each end.  A portrait of a human in full- clad uniform is laid in the
center.  A bloody axe is sliced on the table to prevent anybody from taking
it.  A huge cloth of some sort hangs on the northern wall or door of some
sort that exits out in that direction.  An exit to the south takes you out
of here.
8059.name: Northern Cross Chamber

description: * THE RUSHING FLAMES OF RAMPANT CHAOS *
* OVERFLOWS THE MIND.  TAKE HEED THRU *
* YOUR JOURNEYS AHEAD FOR MORE PERILS *
* AND DAYS OF DESPAIR ARE NEAR..      *
*              THE SOUL WILL BURN..   *
Stand fast!  Flames have consumed the entire chamber here!  Everything
that once was is now charred and scorched into smoldering ashes as it seems
someone has set this chamber ablaze!  Doors away from here can be seen all
around..  Where will u go?  A strange SIGN hangs atop of you..  What does it
say?
8022.name: Western Cross Chamber

description: A blast of hot air suddenly carries you almost off the ground as the
empty dungeon leaves nothing behind.  The air lifts itself way above the
darkness above where a dim light is seen headed to the outside world.  An
exit lies to the west where a door appears.
8045.name: Dungeon of Air

description: Sickening pieces of meat and body parts lie all over the chamber as blood
is splattered all over the walls here.  Chained cuffs are attached on the
walls for those who need discipline.  The odor in here is so nauseating that
you wish to leave here as soon as possible..  A iron door leaves to the
north.
8056.name: Southern Cross Chamber

description: Darkness overwhelms about as you find yourself lost in complete
blackness.  Noises can be heard to the north while a door of some kind can
be felt to the south.
8033.name: Darkness!

description: The rocky walls lead into here where exits are possible in all
directions.  Strange fireflies or sparkles of light slowly fly around you as
total silence is felt in here.  A somewhat warm breeze fills your body as
the ceiling looms into blackness way high above you where a faint glimpse of
the gray skies can be seen.  Several small fires blaze along the walls here
slowly burning the rocks like hot coals.
8070.name: Room of the Eastern Diamond

description: A horrible smell of some sort fills the room suddenly making you sick to
the stomach.  As you look around, several decapitated body parts lie around
slowly being consumed by some small maggots and several insects as the odor
stenches off into the darkness to the east and the north.  A torch stands
high atop the western wall here.  A pair of shackles attach itself to the
rocky walls on the southern and western walls for those who fell prey to
their own crimes committed in the realms.
8030.name: Terrible Smell

description: TO THOSE THAAT REAAAD THIS:
LOOK BEHIND YOU....
** Something just past you headed south!!
The body is badly mutilated and letting out a horrible smell.
Ancient crusty stones furnish the layerings of the walls around you as
directions head off every which way into the darkness.  A whistling breeze
flows about everywhere with dust carrying as well.
A dead body can be seen at the corner with a note attached to it.  Maybe you should read it.
8052.name: Room of the Southern Diamond

description: You can't see anything!  A dim glow is visible to the east while a huge
door can be felt to the west here.
8078.name: Darkness!

description: You are walking along a dark passage heading west and east.  An iron door
with two strange reddish-orange torches hang beside it to the east.  A
choice of directions can be seen to the west of you.
8071.name: Passage

description: Stalactites hang from above you as droplets of water began to drip on the
wet soil here.  Many crusted stones furnish along this cavern as you move
here and there trying to get further into this huge place.  Several small
insects and creatures scurry about.  A stop in the cavern can be seen far
ahead to the west.
8003.name: Inside A Strange Cavern

description: The walls around this chamber are layered with ancient rocks as a
cobweb-filled torch perches on each side of you.  An iron chandelier with
candles set on each slot hangs high above you in the center of the chamber
while several shackles attaches itself in the western wall with an old
skeleton hanging almost shattered in pieces.  An iron door leads out to the
east.
8008.name: Western Cross Chamber

description: A sudden rush of wind and earth flies at your face as the ground is
furnished with fresh dirt.  The ceiling above you rushes with dust flying
about your face making it hard to manage in here.  A door exits to the east.
8043.name: Dungeon of Earth

description: You can't see anything!  A dim light can be seen to the west while a huge
door can be felt to the east.
8080.name: Darkness!

description: The tunnel continues west and east here.  A strange grate of some sort is
stood below you.
8041.name: Lonely Passage

description: * WHISPERS OF FURY BLOW ABOVE & BELOW *
* THE HIDDEN LANDS.  THE POWERFUL AIR *
* SPAWNS FROM THE UNKNOWN ORIGINS WAY *
* AND TOWARDS.. TO VOICE ITS ANGER TO *
* THOSE WHO OVERLOOK AND CARE NOT THE *
* BEAUTY OF THE ELEMENTS AND NATURE.. *
A sudden of rush of air blows about you from the ceiling way above in the
darkness as your eyes fade from the debris that comes with the wind.
Strange torches covered with a crystal-glass hangs on the western and
eastern wall here.  Nothing else is visible but four iron doors that head
out in all directions.  A SIGN can be seen here as well.
8027.name: Northern Cross Chamber

description: As you rope yourself down..
You suddenly lose grip...
OHHHH NOOOOOO!!!!!!!
YOU ARE FALLING!!!!!!!!!
CCCCRRRRRAAAAAASSSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
You find yourself at the bottom of this strange dark place of sorts where
blood and shattered skeleton bones lie about all over.  A rope hangs high
above you.. too high to raise you back up from where you came from.  A
huge glowing door emits light in this hideous little room
to the south.
8006.name: You Fall!!!!!!!

description: This is a small dark passage leading west and east.  An iron door with
two strange brown torches hang beside it to the east.  From a distance, you
make out a choice of directions to the west.
8011.name: Passage

description: HELP ME...
I CANNOT.....
** You stand there in wonder..
As you stand here..  The disappearance of the light outside suddenly
darkens a bit as you enter a wide cavern filled with many spiked stalacites
and drips of water.  A path starts here and veers here and there headed
westward while the outside of the cave leaves to the east.  An old SIGN has
been posted here.
8002.name: Entrance of the Cave

description: At the western wall lies a huge open cage where a recent carnage has
occurred.  A fresh half-eaten body can be seen inside with many skeleton
bones lying around.  Strange symbolic tapestries are hung on the northern
and southern wall where several cobwebs fill the corners of the dungeon.  A
door exits to the east while to the west is a small cage..  Should you enter
it?
8077.name: Dungeon of the Displacer Beast

description: This is a short path that ends not too far to the north.  An iron door is
to the south of you.  Several rats gather together gnawing on a piece of
wood here.
8046.name: Lonely Passage

description: To your horror, you look around and see puddles of blood and sprayed
blood shots across thedark walls here making you shudder.  A pile of skulls
lies on the southeastern wall as deep evil laughter can be heard around.
Below you is another grate securely locked where all the laughter can be
heard.  The darkness appears to the east and west here.
8079.name: Dimly Lit Room

description: This is a small passage that leads north and south here.  An iron door
with two strange reddish-orange torches hang beside it to the south.  From a
distance, a choice of directions is visible to the north.
8073.name: Passage

description: A tiny small campfire of sorts is planted here in the middle of the path.
Dark smokes smoulder the air as a faint passage into the black unknown head
to the north.  A door sealed shut is seen to the east.
8028.name: Darkness!

description: The infestation of bugs and pests is horrifying as you notice many snake
holes of sorts from the walls around you.  An ambush from these little
critters is possible though the breeze is the only comfort provided for you
in here.  Strange unknown markings is seen all over here in scribbles while
rotting pieces of wood lie scattered here.  An exit is visible to the west.
8054.name: Eastern Cross Chamber

description: This is a dark small passage leading north and south here.  An iron door
with two clear torches hang beside it to the south.  A flowing breeze can be
felt to the north where a choice of directions lies.
8055.name: Passage

description: You've come upon a short dark tunnel with not much to see but blackness
all around.  A tightly shut door can be seen to the north while a faint
glowing can be seen to the south.
8075.name: Tunnel

description: The monstrous steel door to your east suddenly seals SHUT!!  The air
around you suddenly feels shiverishly cold..  Like silent death.  A small
white misty cloud begins to surround you..  Almost like a stench of fog.
The walls around you are stone-layered and sealed close almost squishing
you.  The only form of light provided in here is the gray skies high high
above you where a hole in the cavern is seen about 50 feet up.  A small
shaft lies in the southwestern corner of the room with a dangling rope
tightly hanging on a huge steel ring sealed to the floor.  This provides the
only exit other than the steel door to your east.
8005.name: Tightly Fit Room

description: This is a small dark passage leading west and east.  An iron door with
two 'clear' torches hang beside it to the east.  A strange hot breeze is
felt to the west where a choice of directions can also be seen.
8053.name: Passage

description: Darkness overwhelms about as you hold out your arms in hopes of not
running into anything..  Or anyone.  Screaming can be heard to the west of
you.
8035.name: Darkness!

description: Doors lead out in all directions leaving you with many possible ways to
move.  Not much is seen around here but some skulls and skeleton bones lying
in the southeastern corner of the chamber.  A huge vampire bat of sort hangs
high above you somewhat making you hesitant of being in here.
8017.name: Southern Cross Chamber

description: Two separate shackles bind itself to the rocky walls on the northern and
the eastern wall.  Those who were punished for hideous crimes were chained
here for the rest of their lives in hunger and in tiresome struggle.  A
flaming torch perches high atop the eastern wall to fill the place with some
light.  The darkness continues to the west and south.
8020.name: Shackles and Flapping

description: Sounds of rushing waters are heard in the passages that lead off in all
four directions.  Several droplets of water leak from the ceiling high above
you as it reaches into the darkness above.  The echoes of what seems to be
the sound of the ocean can be heard in all four passages..  Either that or
you could be hearing things.
8063.name: Room of the Western Diamond

description: This is a small dark passage leading north and south here.  An iron door
with two "clear" torches hang beside it to the north.  A slight breeze
begins to flow about here as you make out a choice of directions visible to
the south.
8047.name: Passage

description: You walk along a small dark passage headed north and south here.  An iron
door with two strange blue torches hang beside it to the north.  A choice of
directions can be visible as you look to the south.  A huge tentacle
suddenly disappeared behind you!
8060.name: Passage

description: A very bad smell of some kind can be sensed from the west as a very faint
light of some kind is seen to the south.  The walls seem a bit close as you
make your way through here.
8029.name: Darkness!

description: A dying torch stands on the western wall here barely providing you with
any light here.  You make out a trail headed south.
8016.name: Darkness!

description: The tunnel here moves into the darkness to the west where strange
screaming noises can be heard.  An iron door is here to the east where
strange fiery visuals can be seen.
8042.name: Lonely Passage

description: Darkness covers the room completely as you are walking about lost amongst
the blackness.  Noises can be heard to the south while a door of some kind
is felt to the north.
8023.name: Darkness!

description: Darkness covers the room in its entirety as you find yourself lost in
complete blackness.  Noises can be heard to the north while a door of some
kind can be felt to the south.
8021.name: Darkness!

description: This is a small dark passage leading west and east here.  An iron door
with clear torches hang beside it to the west.  A warm breeze flows from the
east where a choice of directions is also detected.
8051.name: Passage

description: It is totally dark and you cannot make your way around.  You stretch your
arms out in hopes of finding some way out of here but find impossible to
move west or north.
8025.name: Darkness!

description: * THE TREMORS OF THE EARTH WILL AGAIN *
* RISE TO CONSUME THOSE THAT DWELL IN *
*       THE PATH OF THE ROCKS!        *
The glowing door from the north suddenly takes you into this dark and
mysterious chamber.  This creepy-looking place is filled with strange misty
insects swarming around you.  Eerie noises from adjacent rooms can be heard
as the stench in the air shakes you somewhat.  An aging door to the south
takes you out of here.  An old SIGN is here for you to read.
8007.name: Northern Cross Chamber

description: Many rotting skeleton bones lie around as you scan around this passage
that heads west and north into the darkness.  On the southern and eastern
walls are shiny-chromed shackles for those who committed the worst of crimes
in the lands of Waterdeep.  A flaming torch stands high atop the eastern
wall to illuminate the room with some light.  You almost trip over a skull
as you notice distant screams from around the rocky walls here.
8024.name: Scattered Skeleton Bones

description: It is deathly quiet and eerie in this dark room.  Shackled skeletons hang
along the northern and southern wall here.  Several rats hideously creep
along the floors as you find a cold feeling about you.  A small tunnel
carries out to the west as the only possible exit.
8014.name: Black Room

description: Gibberish howls can be heard around you as your eyes tend to hallucinate
weird faces of gibberlings surrounding you laughing evilly.  The room is
covered with blood and spots suddenly making you feel dizzy.  Several
torches are hung above to fill some light in the room.  An exit takes you
out to the north while strange markings are encrypted on the southern wall..
Or is it a door?
8074.name: Southern Cross Chamber

description: The fear that roams within your spirits has suddenly heightened as
decapitated body parts, and mutilated corpses lie scattered with blood and
guts splattered along the walls.  The rugged rocky walls crumble in small
fragments as strange tremors is felt beneath you.  A huge skull hangs above
you with a lit candle inside it providing the only source of visibility
around here.  An aging door exits you out to the west.
8081.name: Dungeon of the Deepspawn

description: * SEE NO EVIL...                      *
*     HEAR NO EVIL...                 *
*            BUT HERE YOU             *
*                  WILL FEEL IT ALL!! *
* MUAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! *
As you move along the many scattered stones about in the cavern, a dead
end interrupts your passage to move further in.  A huge steel door prevents
passage to move further west.  The huge door stands about 9-10 feet high
with the rocky walls layered around you.  The walls are made of ancient hard
brown chunks of volcanic ash.  The cavern continues back to the east, while
a SIGN is seen beside the huge door.
8004.name: Cavern's End

description: Sounds of noises and screams fill the room disabling your attention as
you try to scan about the place thoroughly.  Some shackled chains attach
itself on the northern and western walls for those who are culprits to
malicious crimes committed in the realms.  A torch stands high upon the
western wall giving off some light as total darkness is seen to the south
and the east.
8034.name: Noise and Headaches

description: A steady tremor can be felt below your feet as you arrive outside two
huge doors that go west and east here.  You gasp momentarily as you notice a
mutilated body hanging at the southern wall by his head with a nail stuck
right on his forehead!  A passage disappears to the north.
8038.name: Outside the Dungeon Doors

description: You are now headed towards the mouth of a cave where high across both
directions to your left and right are hills that climb almost 40-50 feet
above you.  Voices carry inside the cave where echoes of sounds can be
heard.  An open plain is visible to the east.
8001.name: Approaching a rocky plain

description: This is a short passage headed south.  An iron door is here north of you
while the passage ends not to far south.  A whispering sound is heard behind
the walls.
8036.name: Lonely Passage

description: The gentle breeze shivers your spine as you find utter silence in here.
The chamber appears to be empty with not much to see but a sealed-shut door
to the west.  An iron door exits you to the east.
8050.name: Western Cross Chamber

description: This completely silver-coated room somewhat trembles with a low bass-like
zingy sound.  Strange swirling noises like a wind breeze fill your ears as a
dizziness starts to uprise in your head.  A path headed into darkness is
seen to the north.
8076.name: Silver Room

description: The tunnel here moves into the darkness to the east where scary noises
can be heard.  An iron door is here to the west where driplets of water can
be seen..  Strange.
8040.name: Lonely Passage

description: You can't see anything!!  The floor underneath you suddenly disappears as
an open shaft of sort leads down here.
8082.name: Blackness

description: You shudder in horror as blotches of blood splatter about in here.
Several decapitated heads lie around here almost making you vomit in fear.
Broken weapons and pieces of armor lies battered and torn.  An iron door to
the west allows you to leave here.  Several green blobs of slime smother an
old aging barricaded door to the east preventing you to exit that way.
8012.name: Eastern Cross Chamber

description: A huge circular window stands high atop the northern wall where dark
skies are looming.  Strange clanking noises are heard behind the walls
around you.  The ground is somewhat hot as drips of fire leak from the
darkness above making you wonder how something like that could happen.  The
exit out of here lies to the south.
8067.name: Northern Cross Chamber

description: You cant see anything!  A horrid smell from the south carries itself into
the passage making you nauseated for a moment.  A door is seen to the north.
8031.name: Darkness!

description: This is a small dark passage leading north and south here.  An iron door
with two strange reddish-orange torches hang beside it to the north.  A
choice of directions can be seen to the south.
8068.name: Passage

description: This is a dark small passage leading north and south here.  An iron door
with two strange brown torches hang beside it to the south.  From a
distance, you make out a choice of directions to the north.
8015.name: Passage

description: You can't see anything!  A strange door of some kind can be felt to the
west while darkness continues to the north.
8026.name: Darkness!

description: * THE MYSTERIES OF LIFE'S PORTRAITS ARE *
* NOT WHAT WE THINK IT IS.. TAKE A LOOK *
* AND SEE THAT YOUR OWN EYES MIGHT EVEN *
* DECEIVE YOU.. SO WHO DO YOU TRUST NOW *
The entire eastern wall is layered with mountainous rocks as the chamber
ends here.  Strange blurred portraits are hung on the northern and southern
walls each too unfocused to see.  A strange sign is seen on the bottom of
one portrait.  The exit heads off to the west.
8072.name: Eastern Cross Chamber

description:
This large mimic stands about 6' and is mysterious in its attack!  First
they are content.  Then they appear out of nowhere!
8000.room_name: A huge treasure chest is here glowing radiantly!
8000.name: A Killer Mimic~

description:
It has a beak-like mouth and possesses powers to psychometabolize itself
to enhance power.
8001.room_name: A Psionic Flayer waves its tentacles for your brain!
8001.name: A Psionic Flayer~
subroutines:
F for HMV
F par CDFGHIJ

description:
It stands about 6 feet tall with the head like an octopus with white eyes
and four tentacles around its mouth.  It also has teeth like that of a
lamprey to suck the blood out of its foes.
8002.room_name: A mindflayer swings its tentacles at you to provoke attack!
8002.name: A Mystic Mindflayer~
subroutines:
F for HV
F par BCGHJ

description:
This ugly 6 and a half foot slimey skinned monster forms many tentacles
about him and delivers damage to any who stand in his way.
8003.room_name: A devious-looking illithid scurries about the room in rage!
8003.name: An Ugly Illithid~
subroutines:
F for V
F par CDFHJK

description:
This shadowy figure stands at about 6'3" and is cloaked in black to hide
himself from the darkness.  His motionless stand arouses you curiousity as
you wonder if you should try to fight him.
8004.room_name: A shadowy figure stands here motionless guarding the premises.
8004.name: The Black Portal Guardian~

description:
This huge golem-like creature stands at about 9 feet all and lives among
the elements of the earth.  Their solitary life away from chaos and battle
shows their neutral side of behavior.  Their hard-rock skin allows itself to
be well protected from foes with puny weapons.
8005.room_name: A huge golem-like giant stands here eating huge chunks of rocks.
8005.name: A Galeb Duhr~

description:
This huge winged daemon emits huge wings bigger than curtains as a means
of flying from place to place.  It's fangs and hideous appearance glows with
a fiery aura leaving you breathless in fear.
8006.room_name: A huge daemon is shackled here trying to free himself by flying!
8006.name: A Winged Daemon~

description:
This skeleton is nothing but bones but strangely possesses a wide bone
structure thick enough to provide its own body armor from foes.
8007.room_name: A skeleton hangs here in shackles held from freedom.
8007.name: A Crazed Skeleton~

description:
This goblin stands about 5'3" and is stout in stature.  His smelly green
skin and his tusks shows his true ugliness.  He grunts and roars in anger
from the position he's in right now.
8008.room_name: A smelly goblin struggles to break free from his shackles here.
8008.name: A Screaming Goblin~

description:
This creature stands about 11 feet tall and is somewhat clumsy.  His one
eye allows opponents to confuse and sneak attack him easily.  His height
however can deliver punishing attacks to its opponents despite his low
intelligence.  His rugged yellow skin and hairy self shows the raw visage of
his giant character.
8009.room_name: A huge one-eyed giant looks down upon you and screams!
8009.name: The One-Eyed Cyclops~

description:
This huge muscular humanoid is originally from the mountainous caves of
the earth.  Their style of attack is onslaught and brutal.  Their fierce
appearance and hatred to humans allows them to fight with no skills or
tactics but outright rugged.
8010.room_name: A well-built grimlock roars in rage & approaches for you!
8010.name: A Huge Grimlock~

description:
This long slithery thing has the bleached-white skeleton of a giant snake
with a fanged human skull and milky white snaky eyes!  Its ability to move
quietly around without a trace can be used as a reinforcement in attacking
its prey.
8011.room_name: The Death Worm slithers around and suddenly lunges at your throat!
8011.name: The Necrophidius~

description:
This little naked humanoid is a wild fighter.  Its ability to perform
wildly in battles makes it an unintelligent little thing.  They dwell within
the underground and speak gibberishly amongst others but are considered
dangerous even though they usually travel in great numbers.
8012.room_name: A wild gibberling squats here eyeing you maliciously!
8012.name: A Short Animated Gibberling~

description:
This large hound glows with wild red-brown fur with fiery red eyes.  The
markings, teeth and soot are pitch black.  It stands about 2-3 feet in
shoulder and has a distinct odor of sulfur and smoke.  The howls that it
makes sends shiver down your spine almost breaking it!
8014.room_name: A huge hellhound snarls fire from its nostrils as you enter!
8014.name: A Ferocious Hellhound~

description:
This humped creature features a grim and inhuman appearance, and is
created from the inhuman minds of people.  The creature uses two tentacles
as legs to move about and other tentacles as limbs.  Its underside features
massive sharp horizontal jaws with 2 pairs of eyes.  The hide of this
monster is of many different rainbow colors and feels like the surface of a
human brain..  Indeed a disgusting-looking thing.
8015.room_name: A strange-looking feyr twitches for a moment.. then attacks!
8015.name: A Hunchbacked Feyr~

description:
This aquatic predator is closely related to the umber hulk and lives in
bodies of water.  Though they have only two eyes, they are physically strong
and can even rend the hulls of strong ships and vessels.  Though slimy in
the touch, the creature has a thick, knobby hide underneath all the ooze. 
It stands about 8 feet tall and 5 feet wide with powerful arms and legs and
a mandible of ferocious teeth that can claw into anything it pleases.
8016.room_name: A slimy green monster is here stuck to the wall ready to attack!
8016.name: The Aquatic Vodyanoi~
subroutines:
F for M
F par DEFGHIJK

description:
This thing is a powerful subterranean predator with ironlike claws that
can tear into solid stone.  This 8 feet tall 5 foot wide monster bulges
muscles underneath his thick scaly hide and arms and legs so powerful to
move place to place swiftly.  The jaws are razor sharp and with four round
eyes..  It illustrates into a very unique looking monster.
8017.room_name: A massive umber hulk slowly creeps in your direction!
8017.name: The Umber Hulk~
subroutines:
F for MV
F par GIJK

description:
The body of a leonine, the torso of a human, the neck of a lion and the
height of 10 feet..  The wemic is clad in dusky golden fur with a mane that
covers the back of his neck down to its shoulders.  The nose is russet while
the eyes are gold with vertically slit pupils.  They are the masters of
hunting and ambushes with very keen senses.
8018.room_name: An excited wemic gallops about here fixing his eyes on you!
8018.name: The Wemic~

description:
Existent from the blood of humans, orcs, gnolls, ogres, dwarves,
hobgoblins, elves, and bugbears, mongrelman are extremely unsightful.  They
conceal themselves to be unseen from anybody and go about life doing their
own thing.  Their skills in combat however are not to be taken lightly.
8019.room_name: An ugly mongrelman looks away from you in shame.
8019.name: An Unsightly Mongrelman~
subroutines:
F res BE
F vul K

description: This gigantic thing stands about 8 feet tall and uses the forces of water elements to help him survive.
8020.room_name: An enormous water giant stands high above you!
8020.name: The Water Elemental Giant~

description:
This huge gigantic fireball stands about 9-11 feet and is blazing hot
scorching immensely to make you sweat.
8021.room_name: A huge fire elemental stands here glowing hot!
8021.name: The Fire Elemental Giant~

description: This huge giant stands 10 feet tall and uses his powers of nature to attack all who oppose the force of air.
8022.room_name: A giant stands here blowing air at you furiously!
8022.name: The Air Elemental Giant~

description:
This huge giant stands here 10 feet tall and uses the forces of earth as his
reinforcement in handling his enemies.
8023.room_name: A humongous giant stands here flourishing soil at you!
8023.name: The Earth Elemental Giant~

description:
This creature's hide is yellow and tough with a malleable body.  They
stand at 9 feet and 3 feet in diameter in base with one single eye with a
maw ringed with sharp teeth.  The roper resembles a rocky outcropping.
8024.room_name: A huge boulder is lying here blocking your exit.
8024.name: A Huge Roper~

description: It features the same characteristics and features of a roper but is made of stone.
8026.room_name: A huge stone-roper extends its rocky tentacles viciously!
8026.name: A Storoper~

description:
This little feisty bugbear is a stocky but vicious little half-bug half-bear
that is known to cause havoc on any that stands in its way.
8028.room_name: A stocky little bugbear is here in a crouched position.
8028.name: A Baby Bugbear~

description:
This half-drow half-spider creature is not to be underestimated and can
cause a huge amount of damage to any that stand in their way.
8029.room_name: A small drider weaves a huge web as you enter!
8029.name: A Baby Drider~

description:
This feline resembles of a black panther with two tentacles extending
from its shoulders.  It is a highly dangerous creature and takes nothing
from anyone!
8030.room_name: A black puma walks back & forth here waiting for its next meal.
8030.name: The Displacer Beast~

description:
This undead species is unknown and cannot be described.  Not much has
been mentioned of this fascinating thing.
8031.room_name: An undead entity suddenly appears from nowhere!
8031.name: The Crypt Thing~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 8007 100~

description:
A grey and brown blob with six arms: 3 tentacles, 3 jaw arms, sharp
teeth.  Huge and powerful thru attacking foes.
8032.room_name: An ugly sphere-shaped creature with six arms is here!
8032.name: Deepspawn~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 8008 100~

description: It is the ultimate killing machine!  None can defeat it!!
8033.room_name: Something is moving about here leaving you in wonder..
8033.name: The Mighty Tar-rasque~
